thread.title: BlackBerry to Acquire Good Technology: Business Synergies Cloak Vexing Integration Challenge
thread.title_full: BlackBerry to Acquire Good Technology: Business Synergies Cloak Vexing Integration Challenge

author: Parizo, Eric
title: BlackBerry to Acquire Good Technology: Business Synergies Cloak Vexing Integration Challenge
text: September 08, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Alert With its $425 million buy of Good, BlackBerry is betting its future on winning the mobile security platform market. Despite clear business synergies, however, the challenge of integrating three separate platforms will prove difficult to overcome.
